price: Kuma Mun bai wa Mũsã* littafi, kuma Mun sanya shi shiriya ga Banĩ Isrã'ila, cẽwa kada ku riƙi wani wakĩli baici Na.
arabic: وَءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ هُدٗى لِّبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ أَلَّا تَتَّخِذُواْ مِن دُونِي وَكِيلٗا
footnotes: * Tsakãnin Bãwan Allah Muhammadu da Mũsã, kuma an aiko Mũsã ga Banĩ Isrã'ila kawai, kuma Nũhu an ce masa bãwa amma ba a jingina shi kamar yadda aka jingina bawanSa ba. Sa'an nan kuma Jingina Yahũdu ga Nũhu ya daidaita su da sauran mutãne wajen da'awar ɗaukaka da nasaba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waātaynā mūsā al-kitāba wajaʿalnāhu hudan libanī is'rāīla allā tattakhidhū min dūnī wakīlan
